The Importance Of Hiring The Right Attorney To Handle An Air Bag Injury Case

The purpose of air bags is simple: When a motor vehicle collides with something, the air bag pops out to cushion the driver or passenger’s head. But in far too many cases, air bags malfunction, either failing to deploy or deploying incorrectly, resulting in serious injuries or wrongful death to the driver or passenger.

If you or someone you love has suffered serious injuries or wrongful death, you have a right to be compensated for the injuries or losses you have suffered. It important to secure the representation of an experienced attorney who can protect your rights and obtain the compensation you deserve.

Handling Personal Injury Cases Since 1968

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, we have been representing the rights of people injured in Columbus and throughout Ohio since 1968.

Our attorneys handle all types of product liability cases, including Takata defective air bag injury litigation, and are not afraid to go up against automotive giants like Ford, Honda, Toyota and other major auto manufacturers.

We represent clients in cases involving:

  • Failure to deploy
  • Overdeployment
  • Side air bag failure
  • Driver and passenger front air bag failure
  • Deployment without cause

Our attorneys will investigate physical evidence to determine whether air bag failure was a cause of your injuries. Once we determine that cause of your injuries, we will take a strategic, aggressive approach to fighting for you.

Whether through settlement negotiation or aggressive litigation, we have the skill, experience and resources to help you obtain the compensation you deserve.

Contact Our Team Today. Free Initial Consultations.

If you or a loved one was injured by a defective air bag, talk with a lawyer from our office free of charge to discuss your rights and options.

Call 614-360-2706 or contact us online to schedule a free consultation.
